title: Managing water scarcity on the Canary Islands

tasks.task: Irrigation system construction in the Canary Islands
subtasks: Investigate geographical challenges in Canary Islands
Understand historical water concerns for population and agriculture
Analyze hydraulic technologies and strategies for water access
Examine religious and cultural significance of water

tasks.task: Surface water harvesting in Canary Islands
subtasks: Capture and divert surface runoff for storage
Assess role of trade winds in water supply
Develop systems to collect moisture from air
Drill or create structures for water intake from aquifers
Manage deep well or borehole construction

tasks.task: Water pollution control measures in Canary Islands
subtasks: Monitor water quality and manage contamination sources
Adapt surface water harvesting for local crops
Integrate wind and aquifer water sources into farming
Develop sustainable irrigation methods over time
